name: Project Senzia
description:
A Visual Novel where you will find yourself aboard the Tarasova Space Station to analyze the mysterious Project Senzia. Interrogate the dual personality of the onboard computer, unlock and read new secret documents and save your world from an almost certain apocalypse.

Important! Documents are key to discover the story, download and don't throw them away.

3d art and Ending Music- Alessandro Bianchi
2d art - Lauro Gianella
Development -Davide Medici
Music By Displeasure, created at Red Knife studio
Writing - Lauro Gianella e Alessandro Romano
